Action.author: yacovm
Action.body: My opinion that adding a chaincode shim type is a pretty isolated feature and thus low risk.

Action.author: muralisr
Action.body: This extension broadens the capabilities, invites new uses and (on the face of it) the chaincode/container pluggability should make it non-invasive to the fabric. However we have to be careful that it does not force changes to core fabric (e.g., changes to gRPC support for chaincode or other changes to fabric) to accommodate this work. Does this sound reasonable ?

Action.author: christopherferris

Action.author: greg.haskins
Action.body: I support this. I think we need to put a more formal design around the chaincode->peer interface first, probably. But if we do, it will pay dividends in multiple dimensions including the addition of new chaincode platforms such as this one.
